channel.title: My first models
channel.description: Sorry, they are not very good. :o [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/n6pzdd.jpg[/img] And the results... [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/spk8qg.jpg[/img] Be honest so I know what to work on, I'm new to modeling, and to wings 3D especially.

item.title: My first models
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“Jr97cj98, post:16, topic:360672”]Okay, but I don’t know where to start, I mean, I’ve learned to rotate by randomly hitting R. I’m too lazy to use keyboard commands anyway. That’s why I use wings. But, I can learn I suppose. :D[/quote]K=cut in mesh
press R then X/Y/Z to rotate on determined axis.
press S then X/Y/Z/or none of those to scale on X/Y/Z/every axis.
Press scroller to change views.
press 7 on num pad to go to top view.
press E to extrude faces.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: My first models
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Use blender as a first modelling program and you won’t regret it. Wings is still decent.

item.title: My first models
item.dc:creator: @0bbyme 0bbyme
item.description:
@0bbyme wrote:

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:5, topic:360672”][quote author=Jr97cj98 link=topic=456979.msg3344802#msg3344802 date=1284760589]

Why do they have rings around them? Also, start with metasequoia. It’s easier and I recommend it more for a beginner.

Sorry, can’t use it. On a mac.
[/quote]

Sorry im about to say this but, mac is really really not good for RSPS or any type of gaming, you need a pc if you want to model :)[/quote]
lies! mac is best for graphics, blender, free maya from apple developer or w/e. but you might need a windows to play some rsps’s if your to lazy to learn the command prompt. but out dated macs do suck <- what i got =…
@ models, that look good for a first model good use of primitives.

Read full topic

item.title: My first models
item.dc:creator: @Jr97cj98 Jr97cj98
item.description:
@Jr97cj98 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:7, topic:360672”][quote author=h1 sk1ller link=topic=456979.msg3344835#msg3344835 date=1284761910]

Why do they have rings around them? Also, start with metasequoia. It’s easier and I recommend it more for a beginner.

Sorry, can’t use it. On a mac.

Sorry im about to say this but, mac is really really not good for RSPS or any type of gaming, you need a pc if you want to model
[/quote]

No you don’t. Mac is starting to support almost everything.

And Blender is better for progressing faster. Once you get the keys down, and basics, you’ll be fine.[/quote]
Truthfully, I’ve noticed. But with blender, I understand nothing. =/ I chose this cause I understand everything fine.

Read full topic
